prompts.name: Graph BFS from A
prompts.description: Perform breadth-first search on a directed graph
prompts.content:
You will be given a list of directed edges and an operation to perform.
For BFS, return only the nodes reached at the specified depth (not the starting node).
For parents, return only nodes with edges pointing to the given node (not the node itself).
The graph has the following edges:
A -> B
A -> C
B -> D
Operation:
Perform a BFS from node A with depth 1.

prompts.name: Graph BFS from B
prompts.description: Perform breadth-first search on a directed graph
prompts.content:
You will be given a list of directed edges and an operation to perform.
For BFS, return only the nodes reached at the specified depth (not the starting node).
For parents, return only nodes with edges pointing to the given node (not the node itself).
The graph has the following edges:

B -> D
Operation:
